summary: During the first day of his new school year, a fifth grade boy squares off against a bully and winds up accepting a dare that could change the balance of power within the class.
cast: Luke Benward|Hallie Eisenberg|Adam Hicks|Austin Rogers|Alexander Gould|Ryan Malgarini|Philip Bolden|Clint Howard|Ty Panitz|James Rebhorn|Tom Cavanagh|Kimberly Williams-Paisley|Andrew Gillingham|Blake Garrett|Alexander Agate|Andrea Martin|David Bewley|Simone White|Nick Krause|Jo Ann Farabee|Karen Wacker|Tom Brainard|Tim Mateer|Zachary Flores|Stayce Mayfield|Benjamin Bryan|Chloe Chung|Dan Eggleston|Glori Renee Euwer|Samantha Inoue Harte|Amy Soto|Angela Ware|Herman Whitney III
title: How to Eat Fried Worms
